title: Monsoon Mayhem Mumbai Reels Under Record Rainfall
description: Mumbai is grappling with extreme monsoon rainfall, disrupting daily life across the city. Record-breaking downpours have led to severe waterlogging, crippling transportation networks including roads and railways. Schools and offices are shut down as authorities advise residents to stay home. Concerns are rising about potential landslides in vulnerable areas, prompting evacuation efforts. Relief teams are working to provide assistance and manage the crisis. The heavy rain is expected to continue, exacerbating the already dire situation and raising fears of further flooding and displacement.
